attributes.action: Abolish car park fees in hospitals across the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hospital parking fees are nothing more then a tax on the sick. Many hospitals are situated out of town centres and the only way to reach them is by car. The parking fees are unnecessary and extortionately high in this economic climate. We urge the government to either lower hospital parking fees or scrap them completely.
